videos.title: Sage and Saddles - The Gunnison Bikepacking Loop
videos.description:
Sage and Saddles is a week-long bikepacking route that travels through the incredibly diverse landscapes of Gunnison County, Colorado. The 220-mile route begins in the vibrant town of Gunnison and forms a spectacular loop by traversing the high sage desert to the south before turning north into the Sawatch mountain range. Our latest video showcases the Sage and Saddles route, and why Gunnison is such a great starting point for your next bikepacking adventure. 

Outline:
Intro - 0:00
Gunnison Bikepacking - 0:42
Sage and Saddles Route - 2:41
Route Logistics - 4:20
Route Highlights - 5:12

videos.title: Gravel Biking in Pitkin and Tincup, Colorado with Nick Gould
videos.description:
Follow professional gravel biker Nick Gould as he trains for the Gunni Grinder on a route through the picturesque small towns of Tincup and Pitkin, Colorado. These towns are nestled in the heart of Gunnison County’s abundant public lands. Mining and railroad legacies run deep through this corner of Colorado. The rich history of the area around Tincup, Pitkin and Cumberland Pass is equaled by stunning alpine scenery.

More about gravel biking in Gunnison and Crested Butte, Colorado: https://gunnisoncrestedbutte.com/visit/trip-planning/things-to-do/gravel-biking/ 

The Gunni Grinder: https://www.thegunnigrinder.com/

videos.title: FTGU Season 4: Gravel Training Camp in Gunnison, CO
videos.description: In an effort to prepare our riders for the mountainous, high altitude terrain they will face at SBT GRVL, we brought them out to Gunnison, CO to test their legs, lungs, and skills. Thank you to @GunnisonCrestedButte for having us out in your beautiful, adventurous, and fun town. We will be back! #FTGU

videos.title: Gravel Biking in Crested Butte, Colorado with Nick Gould
videos.description:
Follow professional gravel biker Nick Gould as he trains for the Gunni Grinder. He tours through a scenic, high-elevation zone north of Crested Butte, Colorado. The road over Paradise Divide is steep, challenging and stunningly beautiful, delivering epic views of the Elk Mountains. This is Nick’s last training ride for the Gunni Grinder gravel race in Gunnison in September.

videos.title: Gravel Biking at Hartman Rocks with Nick Gould
videos.description:
Follow pro gravel biker Nick Gould on a tour through Hartman Rocks Recreation Area as he trains for the Gunni Grinder. Hartman Rocks is a treasure trove of dirt roads and singletrack near Gunnison, Colorado. Granite rock formations and rolling hills of sagebrush cover this high desert landscape. Hartman Rocks is adjacent to many other dirt and paved roads near Gunnison, Saguache, and Pitkin, making it a convenient jumping-off point for day rides or longer bikepacking routes. 

More about gravel biking in Gunnison and Crested Butte, Colorado: https://gunnisoncrestedbutte.com/visit/trip-planning/things-to-do/gravel-biking/.

Discover Hartman Rocks at https://gunnisoncrestedbutte.com/visit/places-to-go/parks-and-outdoors/hartman-rocks-recreation-area/.
